Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

Alert Banner

The Alert Banner Object is a fixed container that contains a string, notifying the user of temporary information about programs, events, etc. A cookie for the notification is created when a user closes the object. The alert will therefore not expire until the cookie has expired in 360 days.

Notification Banner
Alert Content
<div aria-describedby="dialog-desc-notification" aria-labelledby="dialog-title-notification" class="o-alert-banner hidden" data-alert="notification" data-js="alert-banner-notification" id="banner-notification" role="dialog">
  <div class="show-for-screen-reader" id="dialog-title-notification">Notification Banner</div>
  <div class="o-alert-banner__content" id="dialog-desc-notification">
    <div class="o-container">Alert Content</div>
  </div><button aria-label="close" class="o-alert__button" data-js="alert-controller" data-toggle="banner-notification" type="button"><svg class="icon--small" role="img">
      <title>Close</title>
      <use xlink:href="#icon-close"></use>
    </svg></button>
</div>
